joke: Why don’t programmers like nature? Too many bugs.
Why did the movie go to school? To get better ratings!
Why was the computer cold? It left its Windows open.
Why did Batman skip church? Because he doesn’t believe in Christian Bale.
Why did the scarecrow become a movie star? Because he was outstanding in his field.
Why don’t skeletons watch horror movies? They don’t have the guts.
Why did the director go broke? Because he shot too many scenes.
Why was the math book sad at the cinema? It had too many problems.
Why don’t movies ever get tired? Because they always have good reels.
Why did the popcorn break up? It felt too buttered up.
Why was the actor arrested? For stealing the spotlight.
Why did the film fail the test? It wasn’t properly directed.
Why did the computer become a movie critic? It had great processing skills.
Why did the superhero flush the toilet? Because it was his duty.
Why did the movie bring a ladder? To reach new heights in ratings.
Why did the horror movie get promoted? It had great scare-er credentials.
Why did the actor carry a pencil? In case he needed to draw attention.
Why was the movie calm? Because it had good composure.
Why did the cinema hire a gardener? To help with the plot twists.
Why did the romantic movie break up? It lost its spark.
